description: a(n) = 1 if n is of the form m(m+1)(m+2)/6, and 0 otherwise.
comments: a(n) is the characteristic function of tetrahedral numbers. - _Mikael Aaltonen_, Mar 28 2015
links: Danny Rorabaugh, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
prog: (Sage) #Generates an array with at least N terms.A = []for m in range(ceil((6*N)^(1/3))):..A.extend([0]*(binomial(m+2,3) - len(A)) + [1])# _Danny Rorabaugh_, Mar 16 2015(PARI) lista(nn) = {v = vector(nn); for (n=0, nn, i = 1+n*(n+1)*(n+2)/6; if (i > nn, break); v[i] = 1;); v;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 16 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_, Jun 14 1998
